		/*private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;

	
		LinkedList<Checkbox> c;
		CheckboxSet()
		{
			c = new LinkedList<Checkbox>();
		}
		public void add(Checkbox newCheckbox)
		{
			c.insertToEnd(newCheckbox);
		}
		
		public int sizeOf()
		{
			return c.getSize(); 
		}
		
		public boolean[] getStates()
		{
			boolean[] states = new boolean[c.getSize()];
			for(int i = 0; i < c.getSize(); i++)
			{
				states[i] = c.getIndex(i).getState();
			}
			return states;
		}
	}*/
